info.name: Tolomeo
info.description: Base and cantilevered arms in polished aluminium; diffuser in matt anodised aluminium; joints and supports in polished aluminium. System of spring balancing. Interchangeable support: table base, clamp, desk fixed support and twin support that allows two indipendent lamp units to be fitted. LED total power 10.2W, warm white 3000K, lighting output 410 lm, dimmable. Michele De Lucchi & Giancarlo Fassina 2009
